title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1632.5 - Report contents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1632.5 - Report contents

State Regulations

The energy audit report shall be in a form and content
acceptable to the division and shall include the following information: (a) an analysis of which measures are
appropriate to the audited building(s), including all measures considered in
the audit; (b) estimates of the
implementation cost, energy and cost savings which would result from
implementation of the appropriate measures, including a correlation with
historical consumption, and estimates of the simple payback of implementation
of such measures; and
(c) a summary
of recommendations contained in the report, including the cost and estimated
payback. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1632.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
